task.title: Changing the security certificate
task.shortdesc: You can change the security certificate that is used by the by using the Web UI Settings page.

context.p: The contains a default security certificate which is used by the . You can upload a new security certificate to replace the default certificate, or a certificate that you previously uploaded. Replacing the default certificate gives a better level of security.
context.note: The Web UI certificate must be either PEM (with either .pem, .crt, or .key file extensions) or PKCS12 (with a .p12 file extension) format.

step.cmd: Go to the Web UI Settings page:

choices.choice: From the Appliance menu, click Web UI Security. The Web UI Settings page is displayed.

step.cmd: From the Security Certificate pane, click Edit Certificate
Enter the certificate details, and click Save
